oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Yellow-light Negative-index Metamaterials
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Xiao, Shumin
Chettiar, Uday K.
Kildishev, Alexander V.
Drachev, Vladimir P.
Shalaev, Vladimir M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Physics - Optics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A well-established, silver fishnet design has been further miniaturized to function as a negative-index material at the shortest wavelength to date. By studying the transmittance, reflectance, and corresponding numerical simulations of the sample, we report in this paper a negative refractive index of -0.25 at the yellow-light wavelength of 580 nm.
